#summary Tolerance

= Tolerance =

http://hddguardian.googlecode.com/svn/screenshots/050/smartctl-tolerance.png

To retrieve all S.M.A.R.T. data from some units, we have to set an error tolerance for smartctl. The options are: normal (default), conservative and very permissive.

If a device is into the database of smartctl, the tolerance option is eventually already set.
